Direct Known Subclasses:
BundlesCachingI18nServiceImpl
public class BundlesI18nServiceImpl
extends AbstractI18nService
implements org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean

An implementation of I18nService that loads several bundles. See /properties/i18n/i18n.xml for details. See /properties/i18n/i18n-example.xml.
